        Specified by:
        reedemReward in interface RewardService
        Parameters:
        ptyid - an unique id of party id.
        rwdid - an unique id of reward id.
        Returns:
        returns JSONObject that has a value of success message.
        Throws:
        NoSufficientGainedPointsException - Exception thrown when there is no sufficient gained point while redeeming reward.
